---
title: Browser Extensions
description: Load custom browser extensions in your sessions
---

Browser Extensions support allows you to load Chrome extensions into your browser sessions. This enables capabilities like specialized ad blockers, password managers, custom tooling, and other extension-based functionality.

## Key Benefits

- **Custom tooling** - Load proprietary or specialized extensions
- **Enhanced capabilities** - Access extension-specific features and APIs
- **Familiar workflows** - Use the same extensions as your local browser
- **Pre-configured sessions** - Extensions loaded automatically on session start

<Info>
  **Enterprise Feature**

  Browser Extensions support is available exclusively for enterprise customers. Contact [andrea@notte.cc](mailto:andrea@notte.cc) to learn more about enterprise plans and custom browser configurations.
</Info>
